about_the_game:
Lock In is a truly immersive one of a kind strategy shooter experience. In this realistic setting you will have to prove your skills in combat and strategy to ensure success against the enemy forces. Lock In features some long loved and long missed game modes as well as a couple new ones with a twist that will really test your combat savvy. One Game mode "Free for all" is currently enabled, the rest will be enabled in the following weeks to come!

Playable Game Types to look forward to:

Multiplayer - with several different game types once all enabled! (Free for all currently Available.)

Campaign (Under Development)

Tactical Warfare (Under Development)

Last but not least Zombies, an all new kind of Zombie game mode unlike anything you've ever experienced before! (Under Development)

Lock In features a Team/Proximity Voice chat. Be careful announcing your plans as your enemy might be around the corner or behind the wall listening in.

This action packed realism shooter features some of the most realistic graphics in the maps you'll be playing on. With tons more maps on the way, as well as even more improvements on realism in the game mechanics underway in development, player controls etc for a truly immersive and challenging experience. 

Get ready to gear up, get ready to set the game plan, and most of all.....

Get ready to LOCK IN!

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and death - as this is a warfare game with the use of firearms, blood VFX and bodies rag dolling after death with the player who died showing their POV during the Rag doll.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 10-core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2070 Or Better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
